name: gemm_fp32_baseline
description: FP32 baseline GEMM: C = A @ B.T. Reference implementation for correctness verification.

M.description: Number of rows in A and C

N.description: Number of columns in B.T and C

K.description: Shared dimension (columns of A, rows of B)

reference:
import torch

def run(A, B):
    # C = A @ B.T
    # A: [M, K], B: [N, K] -> C: [M, N]
    C = torch.matmul(A, B.T)
    return C
